page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER-BARNOLDSWICK
page.content: In Barnoldswick we have 30 P.C.'s, 3 W.P.C.'s and 5 sergeants. We also have 1 inspector. The police work 8 hour shifts:6am till 2pm; 2pm till 10pm; 10 pm till 6am. The Barnoldswick Police Station has 2 cells and a yard in which they put stray animals. The police have 4 patrols: a foot patrol, a blue cavalier car patrol,a panda car patrol and a blue transit van patrol. Around Barnoldswick, the worst criminals are burglars and vandals; these people are usually aged between 13 and 20. The most trouble occurs round the town centre, outside the pubs.
